itemInfo.itemDesc: Down Attack Damage +100% for 8 min.\n- Cooldown : 10 min.

item.name: Oil of Corruption
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Oil of Corruption
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Pure Powder Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Tiger Mushroom
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used as an ingredient in Alchemy and Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Bree Tree Ruins and Kamasilve Temple. Tiger Mushrooms can be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Trace of the Earth
item.desc: A material used for Crafting equipment.\nIt can be Excavated at Ancient Stone Chamber.

item.name: Spirit's Leaf
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy. Spirit's Leaf requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained by Lumbering trees, but only rarely.
